data.name: Pinup Ball
data.detailed_description:
Pinup-Ball is the world's first and only sexy strip-pinball. In this game each table is hosted by a fantasy girl. Unlike "traditional" pinball, each table is divided by unique phases where you get to interact with the model.



Each table also has it's unique game mechanic or obstacle. Deal with water physics, a hanging obstacle with string physics, ball morphing modifiers and more! The game will launch hosting 5 unique Pinball Tables, each with it's own model. The game also features leaderboards and a star scoring system which allows you to purchase clothing parts from the game's main model. This as well as albums for each lady were you can unlock cards by earning coins in-game.



All this, including what makes pinball fun in the first place: Flippers, bumpers, targets, switches, saucers and gates!

data.short_description: The world's first and only sexy strip-pinball!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts full female nudity and erotic suggestive imagery, but no explicit sexual interactions / sex. Comparable to pin-up art with nudity.
